synopsis.text: Their dreams echoing the rhythm of their successful Budokan concert, Poppin'Party finds themselves approached by an enigmatic woman, hinting at a new stage beyond their wildest dreams - overseas! As Kasumi and her friends stand on the precipice of this exciting journey, the band's music continues to resonate without end. In addition, the BanG Dream! franchise unveils plans for three thrilling theatrical films in the next two years, with BanG Dream! Poppin' Dream! set to premiere in 2022. Brace yourself for an exhilarating adventure as Poppin'Party's dreams unfold on a global scale!
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
